K10D0332_H0336:397b-1: k'u t'a g'a ra s'u tra /
K10D0332_H0336:397b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0332_H0336:397b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0332_H0336:397b-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0332_H0336:397b-7: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
K10D0332_H0336:397b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
K10D0332_H0336:397b-10: ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
K10D0332_H0336:397b-11: / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10D0332_H0336:397b-12: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
K10D0332_H0336:397b-13: dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0332_H0336:398a-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba cir 'gyur lags /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-4: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyi dge bas ni cir 'gyur lags /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i sug las kyis ni cir 'gyur lags /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'khor bar bas par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-8: bas ma 'tshal pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis pas ni cir 'gyur lags //
K10D0332_H0336:398a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-12: phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon ni lngar 'gyur te /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-16: bdag gi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-17: gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-18: lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-19: mdzes pa'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-20: lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bo /
K10D0332_H0336:398a-22: gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched
K10D0332_H0336:398a-23: du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byed na de byang
K10D0332_H0336:398a-24: gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi dbang phyug gi
K10D0332_H0336:398a-25: bdag por 'byung ba'i lus kyi gnas sum cu rtsa
K10D0332_H0336:398a-26: gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga
K10D0332_H0336:398b-1: gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched
K10D0332_H0336:398b-2: du dkyil 'khor zlum po byed na de nub kyi
K10D0332_H0336:398b-3: bal glang spyod kyi gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag
K10D0332_H0336:398b-4: por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas 'thab bral gyi lha
K10D0332_H0336:398b-5: rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o //
K10D0332_H0336:398b-7: gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0332_H0336:398b-8: la sems dad pas dkyil 'khor zla gam lta bu
K10D0332_H0336:398b-9: byed na de shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi dbang
K10D0332_H0336:398b-10: phyug gi bdag por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas dga'
K10D0332_H0336:398b-11: ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur bar nga
K10D0332_H0336:398b-13: gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0332_H0336:398b-14: la sems dad pas dkyil 'khor shing rta'i dbyibs lta
K10D0332_H0336:398b-15: bur byed na dzambu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag
K10D0332_H0336:398b-16: por 'gyur zhing lus zhig nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
K10D0332_H0336:398b-17: su skye bar 'gyur bar nga smra'o //
K10D0332_H0336:398b-19: gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10D0332_H0336:398b-21: dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi
K10D0332_H0336:398b-22: rnams kyang mnos nas yongs su srung bar byed na
K10D0332_H0336:398b-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i bsod nams ni dpag tu med cing grangs med par nga smra ste /
K10D0332_H0336:398b-26: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mya ngan las 'das
K10D0332_H0336:398b-27: pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mtha' gzung bar mi
K10D0332_H0336:399a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan @399a *//
K10D0332_H0336:399a-1: pa kun dga' bo'i sems thugs su chud nas ljags
K10D0332_H0336:399a-2: padma dmar po'i 'dab ma dri ma med cing lo
K10D0332_H0336:399a-5: shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma dang /
K10D0332_H0336:399a-6: zangs kyi glegs ma srab mo dang 'dra la chu
K10D0332_H0336:399a-7: zheng gab pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dbu'i skra mtshams
K10D0332_H0336:399a-8: la thug pa'i bar thams cad du brkyang nas kun
K10D0332_H0336:399a-9: dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0332_H0336:399a-11: khyod kyis brdzun du smra ba dang /
K10D0332_H0336:399a-14: tshig kyal pa smra ba la lce 'di lta bu mthong ngam /
K10D0332_H0336:399a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0332_H0336:399a-19: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bden pa gsung ba
K10D0332_H0336:399a-21: gang la la thal mo sbyar te /
K10D0332_H0336:399a-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0332_H0336:399a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag
K10D0332_H0336:399a-24: 'tshal lo // phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag 'tshal bar
K10D0332_H0336:399a-25: byed na sems can de dag ngas yongs su bzung
K10D0332_H0336:399a-26: zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no
K10D0332_H0336:399a-27: 'tshal lo // // sems can de rnams la ni nga thugs khral chung ba yin no //
K10D0332_H0336:399a-30: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni shin tu rab tu gnas pa yin no //
K10D0332_H0336:399a-31: de shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir thal mo
K10D0332_H0336:399a-32: sbyar ba'ang chud za bar mi 'gyur na sbyin pa
K10D0332_H0336:399b-0: la sogs @399b pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci
K10D0332_H0336:399b-3: skyes bu zhig la rang gi gzar bu bkrus pa tsam mam /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-4: phor bu bkrus pa tsam pa'am /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-5: phru ldog bkrus pa tsam gang yin pa de'ang yod la /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-7: 'di na gnas pa'i srog chags thams cad 'dis bde
K10D0332_H0336:399b-8: bar gyur snyam du sems shing gtor khung du 'bor
K10D0332_H0336:399b-9: bar byed na / kun dga' bo /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-10: 'on kyang bsod nams skye ba'i sgor 'gyur bar nga
K10D0332_H0336:399b-11: smra na mir gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
K10D0332_H0336:399b-13: gsum po 'di dag ni bar gyi bskal pa dag yin no //
K10D0332_H0336:399b-15: mtshan gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-16: nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:399b-17: mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa'o //
K10D0332_H0336:399b-19: de la gang gis nyi ma gcig cig srog gcod
K10D0332_H0336:399b-20: pa spong zhing yang dag par blangs te; gnas par
K10D0332_H0336:399b-21: byed na de mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal par mi
K10D0332_H0336:399b-23: gang zhig gis aa ru ra gcig tsam yang dge
K10D0332_H0336:399b-24: 'dun la dbul bar byed na de nad kyi bar
K10D0332_H0336:399b-25: gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0332_H0336:399b-26: gang zhig gis zas nal tse gang tsam dge 'dun
K10D0332_H0336:399b-27: la phul na de mu ge'i bar gyi bskal par
K10D0332_H0336:399b-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag bskyed pa
K10D0332_H0336:399b-31: ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su
K10D0332_H0336:399b-32: gtugs par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya
K10D0332_H0336:399b-33: ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bar byed pa
K10D0332_H0336:400a-1: gsum po gang dag ce na /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-3: sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni
K10D0332_H0336:400a-4: 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs
K10D0332_H0336:400a-5: par mi 'gyur la zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan
K10D0332_H0336:400a-6: las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no //
K10D0332_H0336:400a-7: chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-8: dge 'dun la bskyed pa ni 'khor bar zad par
K10D0332_H0336:400a-9: mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur la
K10D0332_H0336:400a-10: zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob
K10D0332_H0336:400a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0332_H0336:400a-13: yon tan bstan pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la bka'
K10D0332_H0336:400a-15: khyod kyi dzambu'i gling gi gling mthong ngam /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-19: dzambu'i gling gi gling ni zheng du ni dpag tshad bdun stong /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-20: chur yang dpag tshad bdun stong ste /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-22: lho'i ni shing rta'i dbyibs so //
K10D0332_H0336:400a-24: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin
K10D0332_H0336:400a-25: po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste rgyun du zhugs
K10D0332_H0336:400a-26: pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-30: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400a-31: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0332_H0336:400b-0: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs @400b su mya
K10D0332_H0336:400b-1: ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu
K10D0332_H0336:400b-4: gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su
K10D0332_H0336:400b-5: 'jug cing sku gzugs nas 'bru tsam byed du 'jug
K10D0332_H0336:400b-6: la / sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam 'jug par byed na /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-8: 'di nyid de bas bsod nams shin tu mang bar nga smra'o //
K10D0332_H0336:400b-10: dzambu'i gling gi gling lta zhog gi /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-12: shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zheng du'ang dpag tshad brgyad stong /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-13: chur yang dag tshad brgyad stong kun nas zla ba gam pa lta bu zhig yod de /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-15: de rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-16: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-17: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-21: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed pa dang /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-22: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0332_H0336:400b-23: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan
K10D0332_H0336:400b-24: las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru
K10D0332_H0336:400b-26: srog shing kha ba tsam 'dzugs su 'jug /
K10D0332_H0336:400b-27: gdugs ni rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'gebs su

K10D0332_H0336:401a-9: chur yang dpag tshad dgu stong pa kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu zhig yod de /

K10D0332_H0336:402a-23: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10D0332_H0336:402a-24: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba lta'ang zhog gi /
K10D0332_H0336:402a-25: kun dga' bo; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de /
K10D0332_H0336:402a-27: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-0: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams @402b dang /

K10D0332_H0336:402b-18: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0332_H0336:402b-19: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa dpag
K10D0332_H0336:402b-20: tu med pa / tshul khrims dpag tu med pa /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-21: bzod pa dpag tu med pa /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-23: bsam gtan dpag tu med pa /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-24: shes rab dpag tu med pa /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-26: btang snyoms kyi bar du dpag tu med de /
K10D0332_H0336:402b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0332_H0336:402b-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med
K10D0332_H0336:402b-30: pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
